remarks: In an uniform space, a neighboring filter is a Cauchy filter base. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Jan-2018.)
statement:
neipcfilu.x $e |- X = ( Base ` W ) $.
neipcfilu.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
neipcfilu.u $e |- U = ( UnifSt ` W ) $.
neipcfilu $p |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ P e. X ) -> ( ( nei ` J ) ` { P } ) e. ( CauFilU ` U ) ) $.
